text: Maruchan is a brand of instant ramen noodles, cup noodles, and Yakisoba. It is produced by Toyo Suisan of Tokyo, Japan. The brand is used for noodle products in Japan and as the operating name for Toyo Suisan's division in the United States, Maruchan Inc. In 1972, Toyo Suisan entered the American market with Maruchan USA, and in 1977, established a factory in Irvine, California. It was founded in 1953. title: Maruchan
